section.name: Velocity and Development Tools
section.p: We have two contributions from the user community to help make developing with Velocity easier and more convenient.

subsection.name: IntelliJ IDEA
subsection.p: Rickard Oberg (rickard@xpedio.com) has contributed templates for the IntelliJ IDEA IDE.

They can be found
here in the Velocity CVS, or can be found in the /contrib/tools directory of the source tree.

subsection.name: UltraEdit Editor
subsection.p: Herve Guidetti (Herve.Guidetti@idbsoft.ch) contributed a 'WordFile.txt' addition (with tweaks and comments by Wido Hillmann (wido.hillmann@epost.de) ) for the UltraEdit programmers editor.

It can be found
here in the Velocity CVS, or can be found in the /contrib/tools directory of the source tree.
